duties_responsibilities.duty: Advise clients on tax services, succession planning, and wealth transfer planning.
Manage and oversee engagement team for entity, individual, fiduciary, and gift/estate taxation.
Collaborate with specialists on estate and gift planning, state and local taxation, and international taxation.
Provide leadership, training, and mentorship to team members.
Collaborate with senior leadership on growth opportunities and sustain strong client relationships.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in accounting or business-related field, J.D., LL.M. in taxation and/or Masters in Taxation
